About Me

Hi, I am a first year graduate student at The University of Texas at Austin. I major in Mathematics, and I am interested in differential equations. I received my bachelor degree at Xi’an Jiaotong University, where I was also a student of Special Class for the Gifted Young before my undergraduate study.

Currently, I do not have an academic advisor.

Apart from the math study, I also love programming and piano performance.
